1176510.name: SteamVR Device Monitor
1176510.description:
Overview


SteamVR Device Monitor is designed to assist review & improve SteamVR tracking system stability and accuracy.
In 3D visualized room, You can freely fly-thru virtual environment and watch HMDs, Base Stations, Controllers and HTC Vive Trackers movement from anywhere in 3D space. And also devices and chaperone status are displayed in realtime.

Reviewing tracking environment stability and accuracy makes it easier to revise Base Stations positioning, Infrared reflection removal, etc. to achieve to meet your VR business and entertainment project requirement.

** ATTENTION **


This software needs to be launched on PC with SteamVR installed & setted-up.
